name: svg-path-round-corners
description: JS module to make round corners in any arbitrary path

scripts.build: del-cli ./dist && npm run build-es5 && npm run build-es6
scripts.test: npm run build && flow check && babel-tape-runner --presets=es2015 --plugins=transform-flow-strip-types,transform-object-rest-spread test/**/*.js | tap-spec

author: Nikolai Mavrenkov <koluch@koluch.ru>
